PushManagerRegister.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The register method is used to ask the system to request
a new endpoint for notifications.

blockquote.para: Note: This method has been superseded by .

PushManagerRegister.returns:
A DOMRequest object to handle the success or failure of the method call.If the method call is successful, the request's result will be a string,
which is the endpoint URL.
NOTENote: if you do not need the URL any more, please use
to clean up after yourself.
